main_topic.author: alekh
main_topic.title: Agent interface
main_topic.content: Is there some kind of agent interface we can implement? Right now it's kinda unclear how this whole competition works.

comments.author: VolodymyrBilyachat
comments.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  216th in this Competition

reply.author: alekhTopic Author
reply.content: Yes, I've seen it, but it's a bit hard to parse what is the minimal requirement and where the entry point is etc. But I found some usefull information hidden away in the submission modal.  Basically the last function of your main.py file should take an observation and return the response. - I think that is important information and shouldn't have been hidden away like that.
reply.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  410th in this Competition

reply.author: Bovard Doerschuk-Tiberi
reply.content: Apologies, and yes, the entry point is the last function of main.py
